If completely washed out, Australia would advance due to their higher group stage ranking.

Srikkanth highlighted Samson's success as an opener and criticised his frequent shuffling from No. 3 to No. 8. He believes Samson is now the automatic T20 World Cup wicketkeeper choice.

title: Tragedy! Hit in neck by ball - Young cricketer dies during practice
description: A promising 17-year-old Australian cricketer, Ben Austin, tragically passed away after being struck by a ball during a practice session in Melbourne. The freak accident occurred while he was facing deliveries from a bowling machine. His local sporting community is devastated by the loss of the talented young athlete, with grief support being offered to his schoolmates.

title: Sleeping in dark vs sleeping in light: Impact of sleep style on a person's life span
description: Sleeping in darkness is crucial for the body's repair and regulation, as light disrupts melatonin production and vital systems. Even moderate light exposure during sleep negatively impacts heart rate and insulin sensitivity, increasing long-term health risks. Prioritizing complete darkness promotes restorative sleep, enhancing mood, memory, and immune function for a healthier, longer life.

They committed to deepening their special strategic partnership, focusing on economic security, defense, and collaboration in the Indo-Pacific, including through the Quad.

title: Taylor Swift NFL exit: Fans debate if Charlie Kirk or a stalker is to blame
description: Taylor Swift has adopted a lower profile at NFL games this season due to heightened security concerns following online threats and a trespassing incident.  She's prioritizing privacy and safety, using discreet entrances and shielded viewing areas. This shift reflects a personal decision to step back from the intense spotlight, focusing on her relationship with Travis Kelce away from public scrutiny.

Cameron was spotted sporting a large diamond ring during a stroll in Sydney, fueling fan speculation that David proposed on their recent second anniversary. The couple's social media posts hint at their deep affection for each other.

Aspinall's father criticized the UFC's safety protocols, suggesting profit drives action. Despite the controversy, UFC President Dana White indicated a swift rematch is likely, citing fighter health and fan interest.

Azharuddin will be the sole minister from the minority community. His appointment is a strategic decision to address voter concerns and strengthen the party's secular image.

She also shared surprise at early pregnancies, which she felt derailed her personal ambitions. These candid remarks have led to public backlash, despite Stephen's silence.

title: Slap treason case in 'anthem' row, orders Assam CM Sarma
description: Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma has ordered treason charges against Congress members after a senior functionary sang Bangladesh's national anthem at a meeting. Sarma condemned the act as a "grave insult to national sentiments," linking it to a "Greater Bangladesh" narrative.

title: Paresh Rawal on The Taj Story controversy: 'Never intended to create Hindu-Muslim conflict'

Breaking his silence, the veteran actor has now responded to the allegations and clarified that the film does not promote any communal agenda.

They expressed anger over the severe lack of chambers and parking facilities, with only 83 chambers available for over 2,000 lawyers. The protest occurred even as the acting Rajasthan High Court Chief Justice was present.

She often played the 'sassy friend' role in early 2000s films. Despite these challenges, Union has established herself as a credible actress and enjoys a comfortable life with husband Dwyane Wade.

title: Joe Rogan slams UFC’s no-standup rule, cites Khabib as perfect dominance

He lauded Khabib Nurmagomedov as a rare fighter who made grappling exciting and effective, consistently finishing opponents. Rogan also proposed removing the cage, believing it aids strikers. These bold ideas continue to spark discussion.

Flacco being sidelined would push Jake Browning back under center, reducing the scoring outlook for Ja’Marr Chase, Tee Higgins, and Chase Brown. This milestone, despite lagging in the AI race, highlights the enduring strength of its ecosystem. Analysts see this as a watershed moment, with the latest iPhone models significantly boosting the company's value and signaling a strong upgrade cycle.

title: 500 Indians detained in Thailand: MEA to fly them home - why they fled Myanmar
description: The ministry of external affairs is working to repatriate nearly 500 Indians detained in Thailand after crossing from Myanmar. These individuals are believed to be victims or perpetrators of cyber scam hubs operating in Southeast Asia. India previously repatriated 549 nationals rescued from similar facilities.

New ‘common sense’ rule: US ends automatic work permit renewal; tightens immigration norms
description: New Trump administration rules will end automatic work permit extensions for migrants.  Applicants must now undergo fresh screening before their Employment Authorization Documents are renewed.  This aims to enhance vetting and deter fraud, ensuring only eligible individuals continue working legally in the US The change takes effect October 30, 2025.

Fabulist Donald Trump indicates trade deal with India imminent
description: US President Donald Trump signaled an imminent trade deal with India, praising Prime Minister Narendra Modi and claiming he averted an India-Pakistan war with tariff threats. The provisional agreement reportedly lowers US tariffs on Indian exports and includes India increasing US energy imports and purchasing US corn and military hardware.

title: Trade trouble? India-bound Russian oil tanker takes U-turn; here's why
description: A Russian crude oil tanker bound for India has altered its course and is now stationary in the Baltic Sea. This could indicate possible complications in crude oil trade between the two nations following stricter US sanctions against Russia.

Delhi's attempt to make rain: The good, the bad, and what if it really pours
description: And yet, every so often, we try. From Beijing to Dubai, humans have spent decades firing silver iodide into clouds, hoping to bend the weather to our will. The latest to attempt this act of atmospheric persuasion was Delhi — a city so desperate for clean air it decided to summon rain from a clear sky.

Amazon's biggest layoffs: Read HR head's email to employees; Reveals the reason
description: Amazon is laying off approximately 14,000 corporate employees, its largest job cuts since the pandemic. Despite posting $18 billion in quarterly profits, the company cites transformative AI technology as a reason for reducing bureaucracy and redirecting resources. Affected employees will receive 90 days of full pay and benefits, severance, and job placement support.

title: Ronda Rousey and Travis Browne’s 2025 net worth: From UFC icons to Hollywood stars
description: Ronda Rousey and Travis Browne, once MMA stars, are now a power couple with a combined net worth of $15 million by 2025. Rousey's UFC and WWE success, plus acting, built her fortune. Browne also earned significantly from fighting. They have transitioned from combat sports to focus on family and business ventures.

title: Heart health: Expert explains why plaques form in arteries and how to reverse the damage
description: Heart disease, a silent killer, stems from fatty plaque buildup in arteries. These plaques, composed of fats, cholesterol, calcium, and fibrin, narrow vessels, restricting blood flow and raising heart attack risks. Experts urge adopting a healthy diet, regular exercise, quitting smoking, and managing blood pressure and diabetes to prevent this dangerous buildup. Medical interventions may also be necessary.

title: Sugar, honey, or monk fruit: Which is healthier, according to a nutritionist
description: Sweeteners spark debate: nutritionist Suman Agarwal clarifies options beyond sugar. While jaggery and honey offer some benefits, they aren't calorie-free. Dates are a good choice in moderation. Zero-calorie stevia and monk fruit are safer alternatives to artificial sweeteners. Ultimately, limiting all added sugars, even healthier ones, is key for long-term health, according to WHO guidelines and studies.

title: Michael Irvin: Cowboys legend gets emotional as wife fades to Alzheimer’s
description: Football legend Michael Irvin is bravely navigating a personal crisis as his wife, Sandy Harrell, battles very early-onset Alzheimer's.  Initially mistaken for menopause, the disease's subtle signs emerged a decade ago.  Irvin is now dedicated to ensuring Sandy's comfort and dignity at home, employing a 24-hour nurse and live-in caregiver, showcasing his profound devotion off the field.

title: Lauren Kyle McDavid’s Influence on Edmonton’s Design and Lifestyle
description: While the Oilers faced a Stanley Cup Final loss, Lauren Kyle McDavid is forging her own path in Edmonton. Her innovative Trove Living concept, blending furniture, design, and a social hub, has become a vibrant downtown destination.  Her fashion brand and community involvement further solidify her commitment to the city, mirroring Connor's ambition.
